DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the clinical outcomes of using an I-beam or cruciate tibial component in total knee replacement.
DOC.brief_title: I-beam and Cruciate Tibial Components Used in Total Knee Replacement
DOC.criteria: Patients with painful and disabled knee joint resulting from osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, traumatic arthritis where one or more compartment are involved. Patients requiring correction of varus, valgus, or posttraumatic deformity Patients requiring correction of revision of unsuccessful osteotomy, arthrodesis, or failure of previous joint replacement procedure. Patients with infection, sepsis, or osteomyelitis.
